name: [ADV-30] Arazu
description: An Arazu designed for the FC of ENIs fleet (or co-FC). Very long range damps are very useful support in this type of fleet as is the long point. Cov and regular Cyno fitted for escalating if the situation asks for it. It is relatively thinly tanked and the explosive hole is not covered so stay at the back and avoid being get targeted.
